original_text: “‘When they enter the gates of the inner court, they are to wear linen clothes; they must not wear any woolen garment while ministering at the gates of the inner court or inside the temple.
korean_text: 그들이 안뜰 문에 들어올 때에나 안뜰 문과 성전 안에서 수종들 때에는 양털 옷을 입지 말고 가는 베 옷을 입을 것이니

sentences.original_text: When they enter the gates of the inner court
they are to wear linen clothes
they must not wear any woolen garment
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 양털로 만든 어떤 옷도 입지 말아야 하며

sentences.original_text: while ministering at the gates of the inner court
